description.zh-cn: 1927年由国民党清共派在上海发动的针对中国共产党及其支持者的镇压事件，是中国国民党清党运动的标志性事件。
description.en: A 1927 crackdown by the pro-purge faction of the Kuomintang against the Chinese Communist Party and its supporters in Shanghai, marking a key moment in the KMT's party-cleansing campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治及军事人物，国民党清共派的领导者，在四一二事件中下令清党。
description.en: A Chinese political and military figure, leader of the KMT's pro-purge faction who ordered the purge during the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 四一二事件中的主要被清剿对象。
description.en: The main target of the purge during the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 第一次国共合作时期，由中国共产党领导的工人武装组织，在四一二事件中被解除武装。
description.en: An armed workers' organization led by the Chinese Communist Party during the First United Front, which was disarmed during the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 1927年上海工人第三次武装起义后成立的临时政权，在四一二事件中被蒋介石下令解散。
description.en: A provisional government established after the third armed workers' uprising in Shanghai in 1927, which was ordered to be dissolved by Chiang Kai-shek during the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党领导的上海工人组织，在四一二事件中被解散。
description.en: A Shanghai workers' organization led by the Chinese Communist Party, which was dissolved during the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 四一二事件后，以蒋介石为首的南京国民政府与汪精卫为首的武汉国民政府对立的政治局面。
description.en: The political split following the April 12th Incident, where the Nanjing-based Nationalist Government led by Chiang Kai-shek opposed the Wuhan-based Nationalist Government led by Wang Jingwei.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党内主张清党、反共的政治派别，是四一二事件的发动方。
description.en: The political faction within the Kuomintang that advocated for purging communists and opposed communism, which initiated the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 上海的秘密社会组织，在四一二事件中协助国民党右派攻击工人纠察队。
description.en: A secret society in Shanghai that assisted the KMT right-wing in attacking the workers' pickets during the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 国民党将领，担任淞沪戒严司令部司令，是四一二事件的主要执行者之一。
description.en: A KMT general who served as the commander of the Shanghai Martial Law Command and was one of the main executors of the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 青帮领袖，策划并执行清党的主要人物之一，负责联络杜月笙。
description.en: A leader of the Green Gang and a key figure in planning and executing the party purge, responsible for liaising with Du Yuesheng.

description.zh-cn: 青帮头目，在四一二事件中组织力量协助国民党清党。
description.en: A leader of the Green Gang who organized forces to assist the KMT in the party purge during the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国共产党主要领导人，在四一二事件中被南京国民政府列为首要通缉犯。
description.en: A main leader of the Chinese Communist Party at the time, listed as a primary wanted criminal by the Nanjing Nationalist Government during the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导人，在四一二事件中指挥上海工人武装，后被南京国民政府通缉。
description.en: A leader of the Chinese Communist Party who commanded the armed workers in Shanghai during the April 12th Incident and was later wanted by the Nanjing Nationalist Government.

description.zh-cn: 时任上海总工会委员长，在四一二事件中被杀害。
description.en: The chairman of the Shanghai General Labor Union at the time, who was killed during the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党领导人，时任武汉国民政府主席，与蒋介石在分共方式上存在分歧，导致宁汉分裂。
description.en: A leader of the Kuomintang and chairman of the Wuhan Nationalist Government, whose disagreements with Chiang Kai-shek over the method of purging communists led to the Nanjing-Wuhan split.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党在1927年至1928年间发起的一场旨在清除其党内中国共产党党员及左派势力的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement initiated by the Kuomintang between 1927 and 1928 aimed at eliminating Chinese Communist Party members and left-wing elements from within its ranks.

description.zh-cn: 1927年至1937年间中国国民党与中国共产党之间发生的战争，四一二事件是其开端的重要事件之一。
description.en: The war between the Kuomintang and the Chinese Communist Party from 1927 to 1937. The April 12th Incident was one of the key events that marked its beginning.

description.zh-cn: 国民党党代表，于1927年3月6日枪杀陈赞贤。
description.en: A KMT party representative who shot and killed Chen Zanxian on March 6, 1927.

description.zh-cn: 江西省总工会副委员长、赣州总工会委员长，于1927年3月6日被倪弼枪杀。
description.en: Vice-chairman of the Jiangxi Provincial General Labor Union and chairman of the Ganzhou General Labor Union, who was shot and killed by Ni Bi on March 6, 1927.

nodes.id: 上海工人三次武装起义

zh-cn: 上海工人三次武装起义

description.zh-cn: 1927年3月由上海总工会发动的工人暴动，成功后组建了上海特别市临时政府。
description.en: A workers' uprising launched by the Shanghai General Labor Union in March 1927, which led to the formation of the Shanghai Special Municipality Provisional Government after its success.

description.zh-cn: 国民党中央监察委员，提出发动“护党救国”运动，并强烈谴责汪精卫的容共态度。
description.en: A member of the KMT Central Supervisory Committee who proposed the "Protect the Party, Save the Nation" movement and strongly condemned Wang Jingwei's accommodating stance towards communists.

description.zh-cn: 苏联及共产国际派驻中国的顾问，被国民党右派视为赤化中国的阴谋策划者，在四一二事件后被驱逐。
description.en: An advisor sent by the Soviet Union and the Comintern to China, who was seen by the KMT right-wing as a conspirator for the communization of China and was expelled after the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 奉系军阀首领，与蒋介石协议共同驱逐共产国际势力，并在北京搜查苏联使馆，处决了李大钊等共产党人。
description.en: Leader of the Fengtian clique, who agreed with Chiang Kai-shek to jointly expel Comintern influence, raided the Soviet embassy in Beijing, and executed Li Dazhao and other communists.

description.zh-cn: 指导中国共产党的国际组织，其在华活动被国民党右派视为苏联赤化中国的证据。
description.en: The international organization that directed the Chinese Communist Party, whose activities in China were considered by the KMT right-wing as evidence of a Soviet plot to communize China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党主要创始人之一，1927年4月28日在北京被张作霖下令绞刑处决。
description.en: One of the main founders of the Chinese Communist Party, who was executed by hanging in Beijing on April 28, 1927, under the orders of Zhang Zuolin.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，在四一二事件后的搜捕中被杀害。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party, who was killed in the roundups following the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，在四一二事件后的搜捕中被杀害。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party, who was killed in the roundups following the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 国民党将领，在广州主持会议决定“清共”，引发广州四一五事件。
description.en: A KMT general who presided over a meeting in Guangzhou that decided to "purge the communists," leading to the Guangzhou April 15th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 继四一二事件后，在广州发生的大规模搜捕和处决共产党员及支持者的事件。
description.en: An event of mass arrests and executions of communists and their supporters in Guangzhou, following the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 由蒋介石等人在四一二事件后于南京成立的国民政府，与武汉国民政府对立。
description.en: The Nationalist Government established in Nanjing by Chiang Kai-shek and others after the April 12th Incident, which stood in opposition to the Wuhan Nationalist Government.

description.zh-cn: 由汪精卫等人领导的国民政府，在四一二事件后与南京国民政府对立。
description.en: The Nationalist Government led by Wang Jingwei and others, which opposed the Nanjing Nationalist Government after the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党元老，被推举为南京国民政府主席。
description.en: A veteran of the Kuomintang, appointed as the chairman of the Nanjing Nationalist Government.

description.zh-cn: 四一二事件的主要发生地。
description.en: The primary location of the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 四一二事件是导致南京国民政府与武汉国民政府对立（宁汉分裂）的直接原因。
description.en: The April 12th Incident was the direct cause of the confrontation between the Nanjing Nationalist Government and the Wuhan Nationalist Government (Nanjing-Wuhan split).

description.zh-cn: 在四一二事件中，工人纠察队的武装被国民革命军收缴。
description.en: During the April 12th Incident, the arms of the workers' pickets were confiscated by the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 四一二事件期间，蒋介石下令解散了上海特别市临时政府。
description.en: During the April 12th Incident, Chiang Kai-shek ordered the dissolution of the Shanghai Special Municipality Provisional Government.

description.zh-cn: 四一二事件期间，蒋介石下令解散了上海市总工会。
description.en: During the April 12th Incident, Chiang Kai-shek ordered the dissolution of the Shanghai General Labor Union.

description.zh-cn: 四一二事件是对中国共产党党员及其支持者的大规模搜捕与处决。
description.en: The April 12th Incident was a large-scale roundup and execution of Chinese Communist Party members and their supporters.

description.zh-cn: 蒋介石是四一二事件的发动者，下令在上海进行清党。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek initiated the April 12th Incident, ordering the party purge in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 以蒋介石为首的国民党右派（清共派）在1927年发动了针对中国共产党的清剿行动。
description.en: The KMT right-wing (pro-purge faction), led by Chiang Kai-shek, launched a campaign to eliminate the Chinese Communist Party in 1927.

description.zh-cn: 蒋介石与汪精卫因争夺国民党领导权以及在分共方式上的分歧而产生对立，导致宁汉分裂。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek and Wang Jingwei became rivals due to their struggle for leadership of the KMT and disagreements on how to handle the communist purge, leading to the Nanjing-Wuhan split.

description.zh-cn: 在讨论分共问题的会议上，吴稚晖因汪精卫的容共态度而对其激烈批评乃至辱骂。
description.en: During a meeting to discuss the purge of communists, Wu Zhihui fiercely criticized and even insulted Wang Jingwei for his accommodating stance.

description.zh-cn: 上海总工会委员长汪寿华在四一二事件后被杀害。
description.en: Wang Shouhua, chairman of the Shanghai General Labor Union, was killed after the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中共早期领导人陈延年在四一二事件后被杀害。
description.en: Chen Yannian, an early leader of the CCP, was killed after the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中共早期领导人赵世炎在四一二事件后被杀害。
description.en: Zhao Shiyan, an early leader of the CCP, was killed after the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 1927年3月6日，国民党党代表倪弼枪杀了赣州总工会委员长陈赞贤。
description.en: On March 6, 1927, KMT representative Ni Bi shot and killed Chen Zanxian, the chairman of the Ganzhou General Labor Union.

relationships.source: 上海工人三次武装起义

description.zh-cn: 上海工人第三次武装起义成功后，组建了上海特别市临时政府。
description.en: After the success of the third armed workers' uprising in Shanghai, the Shanghai Special Municipality Provisional Government was established.

description.zh-cn: 1927年4月28日，张作霖在北京下令将中共创始人之一李大钊处以绞刑。
description.en: On April 28, 1927, Zhang Zuolin ordered the execution by hanging of Li Dazhao, one of the founders of the CCP, in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 1927年4月6日，张作霖的军警搜查了苏联驻北京大使馆，查获了苏联和共产国际企图赤化中国的文件。
description.en: On April 6, 1927, Zhang Zuolin's military police raided the Soviet embassy in Beijing and seized documents detailing Soviet and Comintern plots to communize China.

description.zh-cn: 自1926年秋天起，蒋介石与张作霖开始秘密接触，并协议共同驱逐共产国际势力。
description.en: Starting in the autumn of 1926, Chiang Kai-shek and Zhang Zuolin began secret contacts and agreed to jointly expel the influence of the Comintern.

description.zh-cn: 杨虎是青帮的领袖之一，在清党中扮演了关键的联络和组织角色。
description.en: Yang Hu was a leader of the Green Gang and played a key liaison and organizational role in the party purge.

description.zh-cn: 1927年4月14日，李济深在广州主持会议决定“清共”，直接导致了次日的广州四一五事件。
description.en: On April 14, 1927, Li Jishen presided over a meeting in Guangzhou that decided to "purge the communists," directly leading to the Guangzhou April 15th Incident the following day.

description.zh-cn: 四一二事件后，蒋介石等于4月18日在南京宣布组成南京国民政府。
description.en: Following the April 12th Incident, Chiang Kai-shek and others announced the formation of the Nanjing Nationalist Government in Nanjing on April 18.

description.zh-cn: 南京国民政府成立后，胡汉民出任主席。
description.en: After the establishment of the Nanjing Nationalist Government, Hu Hanmin served as its chairman.

description.zh-cn: 南京国民政府的成立标志着其与汪精卫领导的武汉国民政府公开对立，即“宁汉分裂”。
description.en: The establishment of the Nanjing Nationalist Government marked its open opposition to the Wuhan Nationalist Government led by Wang Jingwei, known as the "Nanjing-Wuhan split."

description.zh-cn: 1927年4月17日，武汉国民政府下令开除蒋介石党籍并免去其各项职务，号召将其逮捕惩治。
description.en: On April 17, 1927, the Wuhan Nationalist Government ordered the expulsion of Chiang Kai-shek from the party, dismissed him from all his posts, and called for his arrest and punishment.

description.zh-cn: 四一二事件是中国国民党清党运动中的标志性事件，是清党在全国范围内展开的开端。
description.en: The April 12th Incident is a landmark event in the Kuomintang's party-cleansing movement, marking the beginning of the purge on a national scale.

description.zh-cn: 四一二事件标志着第一次国共合作的彻底破裂，是第一次国共内战全面爆发的起点。
description.en: The April 12th Incident marked the complete breakdown of the First United Front and was the starting point for the full-scale outbreak of the First Chinese Civil War.
